chat_history.message:
Hello,

My iPhone 13 is having the following issue:

I just went to my relay point mentioned in the email. There's no package available since I don't have a package number. What can I do?

Thank you for your help,

Hi there,


The recipient of this order claims they haven't received it, even though the tracking shows up as delivered. 

We have asked the customer to look for their package in case it was delivered to a neighbor or family member. If they can't find the package, we asked them to provide the Certificate of Non-receipt and their ID, ---- ONLY IF THE ORDER IS AN IPHONE 12/13/14 (to remove) --- along with a proof of address.

Dear ecomobile,

The customer has received their package today, please do not take the complaint into account.

Regards,
Pélagie from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. If no further assistance is required, we can close the case.

Regards,
AS
